content: Who? I gave up TV when I was 14. Over the years, when life got hard, I’d go back for a daily half hour of drama — think Law and Order: SVU-type shows — but I have spared myself the rest. (Well, except the Weather Channel during a couple of Florida hurricanes before the power went out. Then I moved, and that was the end of that.) The downside is I’m not in touch with modern pop culture. On the other hand, if this self-aggrandizing, narcissistic bs is culture, ignorance is bliss.
